byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: C R Prensa Libre charges German Freighter Wesser, anchored off Puntarenas, prepares to leave as sea raider

headline.main: SAYS NAZI SHIP PLANS TO SAIL AS A RAIDER; Costa Rica Paper Charges Plot to Violate Neutrality
